column4: hey ppl, is it possible and how to add Firefox 3.6 if my default install is FF5?
I got a plugin i wanna use & it only works on legacy FF, no FF5 support yet
thers some devleoper tools taht let you 'force' a plugijn to load in newer versions of FF.. but it still may not work :)
tried the extensions.checkCompatibility hack, no go
